nodes.text: Gama Bankor was a male Neimoidian diplomat who served the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the time of the Clone Wars. In 21 BBY, Bankor traveled to the planet Kashyyyk with a number of IG-100 MagnaGuards and purchased the Wookiee slave Sunchoo from the bounty hunter Crovan Dane. However, while Bankor and his droids were loading the Wookiee onto their starship in the spaceport of the Kashyyyk Royal City, they were spotted by the Jedi Initiate Jaylen Kos and a Jedi Padawan. The Padawan approached Bankor and tricked him into releasing Sunchoo.
